resources.string: Licence check failed - Access to app is forbidden
Unable to validate license. Check to see if a network connection is available.
This application is not licensed. Please purchase it from Android Market.
Permission is needed to write to the filesystem in order to download files
Warning\nServer did not report available image sizes.
No app could be found to rate this app. Thanks for trying though.
Download cancelled. Required permissions are not granted.
Cache cleared. All images will be downloaded from the remote server when next requested.
Cache could not be cleared at this time. If the problem continues, please report the error.
Video Cache cleared. All videos will be downloaded from the remote server when next requested.
Video Cache could not be cleared at this time. If the problem continues, please report the error.
%1$d files already exist on the server. Their permissions will be altered to reflect those selected here, and they will be linked to this album if needed.

Upload complete. Files that could not be uploaded remain in the list for retry if wanted. If any actions are incomplete, you can\'t add new files to the upload list. Click upload button to complete them.
Upload failed due to error in PIWIGO server (%1$d : %2$s).
Upload failed due to web server error (%1$d : %2$s).
Upload failed due to error processing PIWIGO response. This is probably due to a PIWIGO API change. Unparsable response : %1$s.
Upload of chunk for file %1$s failed. Abandoning upload of file.
File %1$s is no longer available on the device.Perhaps it has been deleted or moved.
Uploaded file %1$s is already present on the server, action cancelled.
Error adding uploaded file %1$s to album. Retry?
Upload file %1$s failed due to error in PIWIGO server (%2$d : %3$s).
Upload file %1$s failed due to web server error (%2$d : %3$s).
Upload file %1$s failed due to error processing PIWIGO response. This is probably due to a PIWIGO API change. Unparsable response : %2$s.
Unable to correctly set permissions on gallery. Deleted again. Please try again. If the error continues, raise an issue with this app so we can improve it, and perform the step manually.
Too many users to handle. Please submit an enhancement request to enable paging of users.
Unable to delete an album that contains sub-albums. Please delete these first.
Unable to delete an album that contains photos or other files. Please delete these first.
This will delete the item permanently from the server. Continue?
This will delete the items permanently from the server. Continue?
You\'ve requested to delete %1$d resources that are shared with other albums. Do you wish to delete these from all albums (and the server - permanently), or just unlink them from this album?

"End­User License Agreement ("Agreement") Last updated: 19 November 2017
Please read this End­User License Agreement ("Agreement") carefully before clicking the "I Agree" button, downloading or using Piwigo Client ("Application").
By clicking the "I Agree" button, downloading or using the Application, you are agreeing to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement. If you do not agree to the terms of this Agreement, do not click on the "I Agree" button and do not download or use the Application.
If you are considering using this app to access and or amend a server used for commercial purposes it is essential that you read and understand the limitations on liability. You must test this on a non production server to your satisfaction before accepting any risk and liability yourself based on your decisions. This app has been designed primarily for non-commercial purposes.
Definitions
Licensee: The licensee is the person or company who intend to use the licensed software or already uses it legally or illegally. The term “licensee” does not imply that the software is legally licensed by default.
License
Gareth Deli grants you a revocable, non­exclusive, non­transferable, limited license to download, install and use the Application solely for your personal, or commercial purposes strictly in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED \"AS IS\", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE
Restrictions
You agree not to, and you will not permit others to: a) license, sell, rent, lease, assign, distribute, transmit, host, outsource, disclose or otherwise commercially exploit the Application or make the Application available to any third party. b) decompile or otherwise view the source code or byte code of the application either manually or using a tool c) run or attempt to run this application in anything other than a physical device of type phone or tablet, and that uses the android operating system as its main operating system. d) run or attempt to run this application in an emulator or other sandbox environment for the purposes of examining its behaviour. e) create derivative works based on this application.
Limited Warranty and Disclaimer
The software is provided “as is” and the licensee uses it at his/her own risk. Gareth Deli makes no warranties to its use, to its performance or to its fitness for a particular purpose. It is always possible that software contains errors (bugs) and fails to work. Therefore Gareth Deli doesn't warrant that the software is completely error free, or that it works without interruption with all computers and configurations.
It is solely in the licensee’s responsibility to check if the software fits his particular purpose or meets his functional and performance requirements. The licensee is also obliged to test how the software works on his devices and his configurations; test all use cases and check if data processed without errors and as desired before they use the software in production environments. This is of vital importance if using the software for commercial purposes.
Limitations on Liability
The licensee is responsible for the consequences of use of the software and the thereby resulting direct and indirect damages as far as it is legally possible. The liability is limited to the purchase price as far as it is legally possible; otherwise it is limited to the legally possible minimum.
Maintenance and Support
Gareth Deli provides general support for the current version of the software through email only. Older versions are not supported.
Modifications to Application
Gareth Deli reserves the right to modify, suspend or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Application or any service to which it connects, with or without notice and without liability to you.
Term and Termination
This Agreement shall remain in effect until terminated by you or Gareth Deli.
Gareth Deli may, in its sole discretion, at any time and for any or no reason, suspend or terminate this Agreement with or without prior notice. This Agreement will terminate immediately, without prior notice from Gareth Deli, in the event that you fail to comply with any provision of this Agreement. You may also terminate this Agreement by deleting the Application and all copies thereof from your mobile device or from your desktop. Upon termination of this Agreement, you shall cease all use of the Application and delete all copies of the Application from your mobile device or from your desktop. Severability If any provision of this Agreement is held to be unenforceable or invalid, such provision will be changed and interpreted to accomplish the objectives of such provision to the greatest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.
Amendments to this Agreement
Gareth Deli reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace this Agreement at any time. If a revision is material we will provide at least 0 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
Contact Information
If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact us."

"This app was written to allow me easier access to my photo gallery while on the move.
It will be updated regularly to add more features.
There are two versions, a free version (with advertisements) and a paid version (free of advertisements). You are free to choose which you prefer. You cannot 'upgrade' the free version at present, install the paid version, and delete the free version. Note: There is currently no difference between the versions, and the intention is to keep the versions in-sync. What this means is that the same changes will be made to both free and paid versions. However, the free version is likely to be a release or two ahead of the paid one, making the paid one more stable.
At the moment, it provides a basic level of functionality to allow navigation around an existing gallery, upload of new photos and videos, and creating new categories within a gallery. Some fields can be amended once created, but many are still read only.... for now!
Please can I ask that if you uninstall the app, you use the link on the app menu to email me telling me why the app did not meet your needs so I can address this.
The version of the PIWIGO server I test against is currently 2.9.2.
My test gallery contains .jpg and .mp4 files only. If yours contains others, you may well encounter problems - if so, please tell me and I'll prioritise work on those file types.
WARNING: Versions of Piwigo below 1.9.2 - upload of videos is I think dependent on fix #756 being applied to your server.
I have been testing with a copy of the piwigo_privacy plugin installed and also the VideoJS plugin installed. I have a copy of the Extended Description plugin installed, but unfortunately, this functionality is not yet exposed via the PIWIGO API. I\'d like to include support for "favorite" photos but this functionality does not yet appear to be exposed via the PIWIGO API.
Please report any drop me an email if you encounter any bugs. I\'ve tested this on the android emulator, a Samsung phone and a Samsung tablet, but it\'s my first app so I\'m sure things will go wrong for someone.
A big thank you to everyone who has emailed me with suggestions or bugs. I will endeavor to address all of your suggestions as soon as practical.
Please do choose to report every crash that occurs. If you find the bug still occurs after the next update, please take the time to email me. It's likely I need a little bit more context around what is happening just before the bug occurs.
Releases are on an ad-hoc basis at the moment. The frequency of releases is expected to reduce as the app matures. The release schedule and history is shown below. This may change and things may get delayed, but you can see what's on the list.
Planned releases:
Release 1.3.x - Changes: - ? German, French, other translations for the app ?
Release 1.3.75 - Changes: - User interface refinements - Poll a device folder and automatically upload any content found to a specified Piwigo profile - Support for favorites - depends on PIWIGO API enhancement - Possibly - Notify user of server updates that are available - ? Please email me (there is an email link in the navigation bar) to request things you need or want that this app doesn't yet do
Release 1.3.74 - Changes: - Possibly - The ability to delete an album, but not its contents (creating orphans) - Possibly - Orphan file management - Possibly - Support for user comments - Possibly - allow linking the upload process to a compression routine for videos - Rework of the way popup messages and progress indicators are shown so they always appear. - Tidy the error messages during the upload process - Further investigation into memory use
Released:
Release 1.3.73 - Bugfix: - Limit state recording of slideshow pages to 5 pages to prevent crashes
Release 1.3.72 - Changes: - Altered colours (likely to continue changing for a while) - Rounded corners of albums (Android version >= Lollipop) - Bugfix: - More reuse of images loaded and better management of those loaded to reduce memory load
Release 1.3.71 - Bugfix: - Removed 3 bugs causing crashes that are probably linked to the app being placed in the background. - Ensure that if an upload job fails for some reason, that it is possible to clear that job without reinstalling the app. Note: Not tested - Files shared with the app for upload fail to appear in the upload list
Release 1.3.70 - Changes: - Keystore loading tested - password protected keystores may now be loaded (BKS and PKCS12 format only). No JKS after all, sorry. - Check for and remove any calls to Thread.sleep - memory use improvement for people using the share with feature - Bugfix: - Crash expanding upload album dropdown on upload page before the albums have loaded
Release 1.3.69 - Notes: - Noted people are trying to load password protected keys or from password protected pkcs files - App crashes (that you choose to report) are the ONLY way I know there is a problem unless you email me. I will add an error handler to remind users of this. It sounds counter intuitive, but its sometimes best that I let the app crash because users almost always don't tell me when something doesn't work! - Most crashes are caused by running out of memory - please help me diagnose this if it occurs to you Bugfix: - crash - Race condition after file upload complete - crash - Upload job not found in upload intent (very odd) - crash - shutdown picasso kinder Changes: - Added support for loading password protected pkcs files (untested) - Added support for loading multiple certificates from certificate files (untested) - Allowed loading of keys or certificates from JKS keystore files with a .jks filename suffix.
Release 1.3.68 - Bugfix: - Changed event management to correct bug where files missing from upload page when shared with the app
Release 1.3.67 - Bugfix: - Fixed bug allowing crash on resume of fragments where dialog is shown immediately (e.g. upload) - Prevent user trying to create new album prior to the parent album being selected - Attempted Bugfix (if this occurs for you, please email me saying how to reproduce this): - Attempt to fix bug causing crash when using back button at an unknown point in the app (a guess) - Attempt to fix bug on slideshow causing crash (a guess)
Release 1.3.66 - Changes: - Updated to latest available library versions Bugfix: - Access to the user and group pages resulted in crash on older devices (no vector graphics support).
Release 1.3.65 - Changes: - Added extra error handling around login and logout on the connection preferences page - Logout triggered if you change the connection profile in use Bugfix: - Added resilience for servers that don't report available image sizes in session status. - Fixed logout code so it sends the request to the correct url
Release 1.3.64 - Changes: - Added support for multiple galleries to be configured (connection profiles in settings) - This allows better use of the community plugin as you can log in as guest to see your uploaded pics
Release 1.3.63 - Bugfix: - Bug in the identification of unique files for upload (filename mode only)
Release 1.3.62 - Changes: - Added support for servers using file name as unique identifier for resources (new gallery preference) - Added support for the Log_Failed_Logins Plugin when misconfigured prepending debug text to json response - Added configuration preference for max number of server redirects - Enabled redirection configuration for the video downloads - Bugfix: - Added support for servers not returning md5sums for resources - Ensure picasso loader always reset when altering connection settings - Problem retrieving trusted certificates in preferences page - Reduced max default server redirects when enabled to 5 - Obscure crash in area of server response handling - Silently ignore a page of resources double loaded
Release 1.3.61 - Bugfix: - Prevented requests resulting in SSL Handshake error automatically retrying. - Ensured md5sum is treated as optional when retrieving resource information - Warning: - I have noted that an assumption is made that the server is using md5sums for uniqueness tests. Be aware of this if you use the upload feature. This is existing functionality, nothing new.
Release 1.3.60 - Bugfix: - Re-added defensive coding around data retrieval server calls
Release 1.3.59 - Bugfix: - Crash fix at end of successful upload that prevented delete of temporary upload album
Release 1.3.58 - Changes: - Added support for paging of users and groups - Altered color of checkboxes to make it more obvious when their state can be changed Bugfix: - Corrected bug where app crashes due to UI component being detached from the server response listener - Corrected bug retrieving resource details if resource has no name set - Crash on file upload if an error occurred and the upload screen wasn't shown
Release 1.3.57 - Bugfix: - Corrected bug in the proguard file stopping the released version from working.
Release 1.3.56 - Changes: - Improved memory use when parsing messages to and from the server - NOTE: I've tested this change, but not comprehensively. If you do get errors, let me know. - Added option to clear web response cache simply when caching to disk - Bugfix: - Corrected logic bug when creating a new album
Release 1.3.55 - Bugfix: - Sharing files with the app for upload doesn't always work - Allow community plugin users to share files on device with piwigo upload - Upload file progress bug causing crash - Bugs in file upload that caused the app to crash
Release 1.3.54 - Changes: - New property 'setting' to enable clearing of all cached videos (or pieces) - Bugfix: - Video not playing when caching of videos to disk is enabled
Release 1.3.53 - Bugfix: - Attempt to fix video not playing issue on Samsung S4 (released version of app only).
Release 1.3.52 - Changes: - Added support for the PIWIGO community plug-in as per user request - N.B. This plugin is NOT compatible with the pwigio_privacy plugin. - NOTE: that community plugin API support seems to be very poor from what I've seen so far. You get a very different experience to the website.
Release 1.3.51 - Changes: - Added support for admin users to see albums they don't have explicit permission to see - Add support for admin users to upload to albums they don't have explicit permission to see - Tidied up the masonry view a bit Bugfix: - Album thumbnails now downloaded to match size of image thumbnails - User and groups access permissions setting of album had been broken (does no-one use this?)
Release 1.3.50 - Bugfix: - Bug in video range requests prevented videos playing for some people
Release 1.3.49 - Bugfix: - Better fix for the full screen advert causing a crash
Release 1.3.48 - Bugfix: - Discovered change in google library for adverts causes crash when full screen ad is displayed. Downgraded app to android v26 until resolved.
Release 1.3.47 - Changes: - Enable user driven retry for any failed server request at point of failure - Added masonry style layout (disabled by default) - user request - Bugfix: - Added more defensive code to slideshow (crash reported)
Release 1.3.46 - Bugfix: - Log in as a normal (non admin or webmaster) user was broken. Thanks Olivier for pointing this out!
Release 1.3.45 - Changes: - Updated to latest library versions and compiled for the latest version of Android. - Upload - recognise existing files and link to upload album (and change access permissions to those selected for this upload job). - Altered EULA to allow use of the app commercially - Bugfix: - Fixed a couple of causes of crash (slideshow and upload) - Notifications not working on Oreo and above.
Release 1.3.44 - Changes: - Added "unlink from album" option for the delete of multiple resources - Will require a change to piwigo 2.9.2 to be efficient (ticket raised). - Improve the long click delete album functionality - Added warning about http hosted piwigo server - Bugfix: - Update positively affected albums correctly after linking a resource to one - Correctly disable upload button when pressed - Fixed a memory leak - Corrected wording of album delete to reflect action
Release 1.3.43 - Bugfix: - Allow guest users (of the piwigo server) to log in again - Fix the unlock app dialog
Release 1.3.42 - Bugfix: - Crash in area of video cache for users of video cache created with older versions - Leak in request handlers could cause the queue (3) to fill and app to lock for the 5 minute timeout if login credentials aren't correct
Release 1.3.41 - Changes: - Build and upload a paid, advert free version, retained identical licence terms. If you wish to use the app commercially, which the EULA prohibits, please email me. - Added an active email link to the EULA page. - Added "Copy link" (to clipboard) option on download dialog - Checked the app works with piwigo server 2.9.2 - Bugfix: - Names of albums now always shown
Release 1.3.40 - Bugfix: - Fix bug causing crash when webservice call forced to terminate early
Release 1.3.39 - Bugfix: - Fixes bug introduced in rush to release 1.3.38 causing app to close unexpectedly.
Release 1.3.38 - Changes: - New dialog explaining the trusted certificate store operation - Bugfix: - Auto install of trusted certificates wasn't always occurring - changes to shutdown code for http client to try and remove cache has been shutdown error message
Release 1.3.37 - Changes: - Previews are now generated for video files (upload screen) - Bugfix: - Upload button correctly disabled when upload started - DialogBox now displays correctly on login page again
Release 1.3.36 - Changes: - Connection Settings: User feedback for the piwigo server address field (if missing a valid scheme) - Upload and Upload Settings: Check for sensible file sizes of files selected for upload (default max size to upload without warning 20MB) - Album Settings: Reduced the default page size for requests of album contents to 20 items per request (from 100) - Album Settings: Added option to allow image names to be hidden - Bugfix: - Display user values for encrypted fields in the preferences correctly. - Upload Controls not re-enabled following job completion until re-opening page - Album not auto-refreshing on return from upload page (if a file uploaded while there to this album)
Release 1.3.35 - Changes: - Altered the app icon to use one based on the material.io icons that are used throughout the app - Added a reference to the material.io icon set in the about page.
Release 1.3.34 - Changes: - Added code to allow release of paid for version without adverts - Added video mime type to list of supported types for Upload activity (where you share a file with this app) - Changes to the way popup messages are generated to prepare for more comprehensive alterations later - Confirmed the app should now support, * though I have not tested * Digest and Kerberos authentication (any realm) - Improved security around stored authentication information - Better handling of album permissions regarding presently logged in user - Stop CPU going to sleep (and thus terminating) background upload job Bugfix: - Fixed (and tested) Basic Authentication support (note: the credentials will be used for all realms on your server). - Fixed bug when disabling custom trusted server certificate store - Selecting trusted server or client authentication certificates in preferences didn't work - Fixed (and tested) client certificate authentication - Album not automatically refreshed after pasting copied resources - Errors in the handling of restarting jobs that failed - Errors with some upload defaults not being used correctly
Release 1.3.33 - Changes: - Allow restart of partially uploaded files that previously would have failed and needed manual intervention. - Now create and use a temporary album for upload - to ensure files are never visible to people they aren't intended for - Allow upload job to be recovered if the app crashes for any reason during the upload Bugfix: - Massively better memory management by changing image load code at expense of slightly fuzzy thumbnails (Fix out of memory errors) - Crash in albums with blank album spacers in some circumstances - Crash opportunity in video cache management
Release 1.3.32 - Bugfix: - Errors in proguard file following changes may well be causing app events not to be received by other app components
Release 1.3.31 - Changes: - Following user feedback, reduced full screen ad frequency on both upload and album browsing to show no more than once every 24 hours - Added banner ads to all pages Bugfix: - Missing click listener on album list item when not using large album thumbnails - Retry button not shown sometimes on view album page - User page starts now scrolled to top
Release 1.3.30 - Changes: - Added support to select default image downloaded in slideshows (default: based on device screen size) - General tidy of the way server calls are made - Support for controlling caching of responses from the server - on disk or in memory (previously disabled) - Support for custom trusted certificate store (for self signed certs and or non standard root CAs) Bugfix: - All server calls are now resilient to session timeout - Click handler for thumbnails and images not loaded correctly - Playing a video prevented playing another until app restart - Lots of little niggles
Release 1.3.29 - Changes: - Allow upload of videos (change api used for upload) Bugfix: - Fixed upload of multi chunk photos again - App can be minimised without crashing again - Fixed Crash on App LowMemory warning
Release 1.3.28 - Changes: - Added reminder to rate the app. Will remind you once per install. Can be cancelled. - Tidy up the upload and create album screen - Overhaul of the permissions selection screens (User, Group, Album). - Added option to create a sub-album when viewing the album contents Bugfix: - Permissions settings wasn't working properly - Fixed a number of causes of crashes - Fixed a few bugs where screen content potentially didn't accurately reflect server content - Fixed a potential cause of memory leak in file upload - Better memory management
Release 1.3.27 - Changes: - Redesigned the default layout of the upload file list - Tweaked the appearance of the album view - Allow altering the way that albums are displayed (settings) - Shuffled the settings a bit - Tweaked the appearance of the upload view (configurable in settings) Bugfix: - Regression - Albums without a thumbnail were no longer supported
Release 1.3.26 - Bugfix: - Release 1.3.25 was a disaster - instant crash on most phones. Sorry!
Release 1.3.25 - Changes: - Link to albums file present in within slideshow details works more logically - Extra retry attempt to server if connection fails - Extra gallery setting to configure theme - Extra gallery setting to configure albums visible per row - Tidied layout of album and slideshow Bugfix: - Names of images now always shown
Release 1.3.24 - Changes: - Allow moving and copying files between albums - Allow bulk copy move and delete of files in an album Note: A feature of PIWIGO means that if you move the final image from an album, it remains that album's thumbnail BugFix: - Further Exception handling in server login code - Prevent crash if album list retrieve fails on upload screen - Total Photo count for sub albums incorrect - Large cached videos could cause crash
Release 1.3.23 - Bugfix: - Prevent access to new delete functionality if not admin user or app in read only mode - Corrected bug in the app Lock functionality (used when logged in as an admin)
Release 1.3.22 - Changes: - Can change album thumbnail, both for current album and any other in the gallery - Can select and delete resources in bulk from an album - Can delete an album by "long clicking" within the parent album - Can now delete an album even if it contains images and or sub albums. Bugfix: - State not saved correctly on picture slideshow item - State not saved for create album fragment (crash on resume)
Release 1.3.21 - Changes: - Opening the root album clears all app history back to the first time an album was viewed. - When using back button on preferences page, the root album is opened (note above change). Bugfix: - Crash on Upload page - Crash due to page history growing too large (it is now trimmed) - Hopefully fixed crash on View Album page (not certain what is causing it at the moment) - When returning to upload in progress, changed user makes to file upload list are not applied to running job
Release 1.3.20 - Bugfix: - Paging of album content (crash) - View downloaded item on Android 7+ (crash) - Crash if screen closed just before it triggered a call to server - Crash after downloading image on Android versions below 5 (Lollipop) - Not auto changing displayed screen after login
Release 1.3.19 - Improvement: - Added code to allow reloading an album when some or all content fails to load - Bugfix: - Errors in the area of the file upload process (interaction with existing albums) - Back button didn't work correctly, particularly in app settings
Release 1.3.18 - Bugfix: - Crash reported on Android 5.0 on Upload screen - Other bugs linked to upload
Release 1.3.17 - Bugfix: - New album load routines crashed app on some albums
Release 1.3.16 - Bugfix: - Screen overlay when back button use on first use. Improvements: - Minor tuning - Default to allow videos to be played (new installs) - New top tip
Release 1.3.15 - Bugfix: - Image preview not shown on upload page - Crash when attempting to share images with app and it is not yet configured - since 1.3.4 (just reported) - Image download did not work - Crash when attempting to use email-to hyperlink when not logged in to server - Crash while rapidly traversing slideshow items - Client SSL certs support obviously broken (still untested) Improvements: - handling of invalid server preferences - paging of album content - Allow choice over image displayed - Allow greater image zoom on demand - Top Tips page added
Release 1.3.14 - Bugfix - Potential crash if the session times out while viewing an album / slideshow. Extra debug - to try and identify a crash that someone experienced on the file upload screen.
Release 1.3.13 - Bugfix - For non admin users, album permissions are incorrectly displayed and load attempted - this fails as not authorised and displays a misleading error message in album. Bugfix - For non admin users, album edit button is displayed. Bugfix - Not all parent album content displayed is automatically refreshed on upload to a child album
Release 1.3.12 - Bugfix - crash caused by saving invalid piwigo server resourceUrl in the preferences
Release 1.3.11 - Added rough but theoretically complete support for client certificate authentication (UNTESTED - Please email me if this doesn't work - I'll prioritise completing it). - supports importing of client certificate from .p12 and .cer files. Bugfix - regression - where slideshow position is reset when screen is rotated Bugfix - regression - permissions incorrectly shown for album items Bugfix - regression - where slideshow shows occasional blank positions after deleting a number of items from it Bugfix - slideshow not in sync with gallery contents after returning from an upload operation (warning now shown) Bugfix - issue if deleting a slideshow item before server has had time to return the resource details (privacy details and rating). Bugfix - Upload of file seems to randomly "fail" stating it's already been added to the server (HTTP 500 response received from server)
Release 1.3.10 - Bug fixes surrounding the new functionality of uploading by sharing images. Bug fixes on issues that cause a crash if the app is minimised during Uploading
Release 1.3.9 - Hope to have fixed a bug caused when the app is left for long periods and the session is logged out. Please report the crashes still if this occurs again.
Release 1.3.8 - Bug fixes. (Mainly - Re-enabled Uploading of images) Added a share-to action so you can select a file or files for upload using other apps.
Release 1.3.7 - Added support for adding / editing groups and their permissions Fixed a number of bugs in or around the slideshow area of the app Fixed a bug preventing video playback on non standard http/https ports Further performance enhancements
Release 1.3.6 - Added support for adding / editing users and their permissions Added support for servers running schemes on non standard ports (e.g. https on port 80, or server running on port 81 etc) Added support to accept invalid SSL certificates if wanted (sometimes needed when using public wifi that intercepts https traffic) Prevent access to admin screens previously visited when the app is locked by using the back button
Release 1.3.5 - Caching of videos is not required to allow playback now Preferences now display correctly when returning to them using the back button. Corrected bugs in the use of back button generally Switched offset of image/album detail toggle button to be in dp (if you need px instead, please tell me)
Release 1.3.4 - Firstly, apologies, this release has been a long time coming but I wanted to be sure that I had only introduced improvements Reworked the PIWIGO API access to stop responses getting "lost" if the device is for example rotated while a request to the server is in progress Removed several bugs that would cause the app to crash. Changed file upload to allow uploading to continue in the background Added local caching of video files (configurable) and the ability to save fully cached videos locally if enabled. Removed image size download option for image sizes not explicitly generated on the server Corrected a bug in the slideshow displayed while deleting files Long click on album thumbnails and album resources invokes redownloading of that resource (On Videos, it clears any locally cached data) Fixed a number of bugs in the area of changing user sessions without restarting the app Clear the back button history when a user session is changed Added a gallery property to allow user correction of the positioning of the image / video details bottom drawer that slides up You can drill into users and groups and view album permissions in full screen to make this easier on a small screen
Release 1.3.3 - Fixed a bug that was reported by a user as causing an application crash (in Release 1.3.1)
Release 1.3.2 - Fixed a bug that was reported by a user as causing an application crash (in Release 1.3.1) Added ability to browse users and groups, view their permissions across a gallery, and delete them as wanted.
"
Licences for resources used within this App

The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE
*** Android Multiple File Selector Dialog - paul.arian.fileselector

If you choose to lock the app, the app will allow read only access to the gallery only. Changing ratings of images etc is disabled, and access to the app settings is removed. To unlock you will need to provide your current PIWIGO user password.
Enter the PIWIGO password for %1$s to re-enable full access to all features of this app and click unlock.
The app has now been unlocked
The device is running low on memory. The in memory image cache has been cleared.
Please choose the file size you wish to download
Please choose the file size you wish to view
The server is running PIWIGO version %1$s. The minimum version tested with this app is %2$s. Some features in the app may not work as expected. Please check the about page for any identified issues.
The thumbnail size you have selected is not natively supported by the server you are connected to. The server will return the \"nearest match\" sized image.
If you enjoy using this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
Error while deleting group (%1$s). Please retry.
Error while deleting user (%1$s). Please retry.
Are you sure you want to delete this group? Any users that are members of it will not be deleted, but may lose access to the areas of the gallery this group has.
Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Sorry, you cannot delete the user you\'re logged in as (%1$s).
Permission is needed to read the filesystem in order to select and upload files
Local caching of Video files is enabled. To allow this, write access to the file system must be granted. If denied, local caching will be disabled.
Unable to tidy the video cache. If this issue persists, please report it.
Unable to copy file from cache. %1$s
Clear cached data for this resource and force re-download from the server?
Unable to load album content or permissions details
Unable to load album content or permissions details
Without access to the local filesystem, this action cannot proceed. Sorry.
Only admin users can upload. Sorry.
This slideshow no longer accurately reflects the current album contents
App not yet configured and connected to a PIWIGO server. Please open the app manually and configure it before attempting to share items with it.
Unacceptable piwigo server details, please check app connection configuration
Long click on an image (either thumbnail or slideshow item) that has failed to load in order to retrieve it again
Long click on an album to delete that album and all content
Long click on an album image to enable bulk selection of images for an action
When viewing any image in the slideshow, long click to rotate / change image size shown / allow further zooming
You can zoom into an image when viewing in a slideshow by drawing two fingers together or apart on the screen
If the image / album details drawer action button is not shown (or positioned incorrectly), try adjusting the offset in the preferences.
When logged in as an administrator, before handing your device to a friend to view your photos, engage the application lock feature to prevent inadvertent changes being made to your gallery
Once you have viewed an entire video, if local file caching is enabled, it is possible to save that video to your downloads folder
Long click delete button on a \'file for upload\' to delete all files to be uploaded (when job is not in progress)
As of 21/12/2017, the PIWIGO community plugin is NOT compatible with the piwigo privacy plugin (not an app fault)
As of 21/12/2017, The PIWIGO community plugin does not allow you to see any albums other than those you can upload to (using the web api)
Please select an album to upload to
Please select the album from the list below
Update album thumbnail to this image?
Are you sure you wish to delete the album (%1$s) and all content permanently (unless linked to albums elsewhere)?

Are you absolutely certain you want to delete album (%1$s) with %2$d photos, and %3$d child albums containing a further %4$d photos for ever? Note that photos linked to other albums will remain there, but any others are deleted forever. There is no undo feature for this action.
Copy the %1$d item(s) in the basket here (%2$s)?
Move the %1$d item(s) in the basket here (%2$s)?
You\'ve selected to remove access to this album and navigable access to all child albums from %1$d groups and %2$d users. Continue with this action?
You\'ve selected to add access to this album for %1$d groups and %2$d users. Would you like to apply these changes to the %3$d child albums?
Your changes may have prevented you accessing this album. Your username has been added to the list of those with explicit permission.
Your changes would have prevented you accessing this album. Your username has been added to the list of those with explicit permission.
Adding permissions to %1$d child albums too.
A name for this album must be provided. Please add one and then try again.
Server didn\'t respond correctly following file upload
Cannot upload file %1$s as it is missing a file extension, for example .jpg
Verification of file on server failed for upload of %1$s
This file has been partially uploaded and you must remember to click the upload button after this to remove the corrupt file from the server. Continue?
The image size you have selected is not natively supported by the server you are connected to. The server will return the \"nearest match\" sized image.
To allow caching to disk, write access to the file system must be granted. If denied, caching will be in memory.
Call to server cancelled as it took too long to complete.
Caching of videos to disk disabled
Read write access to the cache folder is needed. Check app settings.
Self signed SSL certificates should not be used on a public facing server (on the internet) - investigate at https://letsencrypt.org or similar. This is for testing purposes only.
Error adding certificate to trust store
Add Certificate chain to list of trusted CAs?\n\n
HTTP Engine shutdown. Will be restarted automatically as needed.
Resetting the list of certificates chosen to be trusted
Delete all files selected for upload?

Cancelling a file upload after it has been partially transferred to the server will result in the partial upload remaining on the server. Manually clean the upload folder on the server (e.g. /var/www/piwigo/upload/buffer) to save space.
Album could not be created, please retry
Album was created, but permissions could not be set. The attempt to delete the partially set up album failed. Please check the server directly.

There were %1$d other users found to share this username (%2$s). The most recent user of this Piwigo server was selected, but this is not safe if it is possible that they will be using the server at the same or similar time. Please consider changing these usernames so username is a unique identifier for a given class of user.
This permission is needed in order to keep the Upload running while the screen is switched off.

You must prefix your server address with either http:// or https://. No other schemes are supported. Port is optional if the default - 80 for http or 443 for https. Example http://piwigo.org/demo or http://piwigo.org:80/demo
The following %1$d files exceeded the warning threshold: %2$s. Would you like to remove these from the upload?

Untrusted certificates supplied by the server upon connection will be presented to you so as you may choose to add these to the trust store. If you decline, you will not be prompted again for the same certificate. In order to be prompted again, deselect and reselect the option to use a custom trusted certificate store.
Your server is using http. This is not a good idea because the username and password are transmitted to the server in plain text. I strongly recommend you change your server to use https.
Failed to load the full administrative list of albums
No server uri specified. Please add the location of your server and retry.
The following certificate files could not be loaded:
The following keystore files could not be loaded:
The following keystore aliases could not be loaded:
An error occured after successfull uploading all files. Temporary folder may not have been deleted from the server. Ignore this error and fix it manually at some point?
An error occured before uploading all files. Temporary folder may not have been successfully created for example. Cancel the upload?
